description:
Fifth year ro class. Age 14, Gemini, blood type B. Member of the Class Presidents Committee.
A student with a thousand face, to the point that no one, including the school staff, knows his true face. Saburou is a mischievous, calm and cool student who enjoys wearing disguises of just about anyone, and sometimes alternates faces in-between scenes. Saburou most of the time disguises as Raizou considering the two are quite close friends.
Source: Wiki
name: Hachiya Saburou
